description: For VNC to work on ESX, the appropriate ports have to be open in the firewall.  VMware has the ability to install scripts (which are called vibs) easily.  Putting this file in the tools directory would simplify vSphere customer deployments.  This patch proposes to put a file in the nova/tools/vmwareapi directory.
title: add file to open firewall ports to enable vmc to nova/tools
